Benchmark.title: Warning Examples
Benchmark.description: This benchmark demonstrates use of the enhanced warning capability.

Profile.title: Standalone Systems
Profile.description: This profile selects the requirements that are applicable to systems operating in a standalone envirionment.
Profile.warning: This profile is only intended for use on standalone systems. Use of this profile on other systems will result in incomplete assessment.

check.warning: This check may return a false positive if the local Administrator account has been renamed.
This check may return a false negative result if a third-party web server is installed.
